content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case began with one party filing a complaint against another outlining the issues and requesting relief the defendant then filed an answer addressing the allegations both parties engaged in the discovery process exchanging documents and conducting depositions to gather evidence they then participated in a settlement conference to try and reach an agreement if no settlement was reached the case proceeded to trial where both parties presented their arguments and evidence after the trial the court issued a judgment determining the outcome and relief granted either party had the option to file an appeal which would be reviewed by a higher court the text does not provide information on the outcome of the appeal or any further steps in the case the summary also mentions a specific legal case where a real estate property was divided among parties based on technical and expert reports a counterclaim was dismissed and the court made rulings based on the civil code the specific parties involved are not mentioned but the ruling was made on may 19 2020 by judge dr e in crotone
